#summary Planned Improvements for JavaScript Parser Extension

Please visit [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/js-addin discussion group] if you want to ask something or you have a great idea how to improve this addin.

Plans for version 3.4:

 # Fix issue #20
 # Improve parser to display names of string-defined properties. Like this:
   <code language="javascript">
    buttons: {
                "OK": function () {
                    
                    });
                },
                "Cancel": function () {
                    $(this).dialog("close");
                }
            },
   </code>
 # Improve parser to display hierarchy in following case
   <code language="javascript">
     var  module = (function() {
       var me={}, privateFunc1,privateFunc2;
       me.publicMethod1=function() {
       };
       me.publicMethod2=function() {
       };
       privateFunc1 = function() {  .. };
       privateFunc2 = function() {  .. };
       return me;
     }
   </code>
